mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, status, write_date, is_lock, IF(is_lock = 1, NULL, mood_id) AS mood_id, IF(is_lock = 1, NULL, keyword) AS keyword, IF(is_lock = 1, NULL, site) AS site, IF(is_lock = 1, NULL, remark) AS remark, /*IF(is_lock = 1, NULL, created) AS created, IF(is_lock = 1, NULL, updated) AS updated*/ score, created, updated FROM tb_diary WHERE user_id = #{uId} AND status != -1 AND score >= 3 ORDER BY write_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_diary( user_id, mood_id, write_date, keyword, site, remark, status, is_lock, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{moodId}, #{writeDate}, #{keyword}, #{site}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{isLock}, #{created}, #{updated} )
mapper.update:

mood_id = #{moodId},
write_date = #{writeDate},
keyword = #{keyword},
site = #{site},
remark = #{remark},

is_lock = #{isLock},
